EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Atlanta Porsche Experience Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-atlanta/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
How are IT executives like you accelerating business growth and tackling challenges ofadopting and managing a hybrid cloud strategy? Find out on April 25th during an exclusive Porsche-driving experience hosted by Turbonomic at the Porsche Experience Center Atlanta. Join us for an afternoon of networking, food, and exotic cars as we tackle discussions around hybrid cloud, containers, and edge computing.
Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud Porsche Experience Center Atlanta Wednesday, April 25th | 11:30 a.m.
<[[https://turbonomic.com/vip-atlanta]]>
We hope to see you there,
Your friends at Turbonomic
